messages.subject: A plea for post trimming
messages.msgSnippet: I d like to issue a personal plea to all posters - please please please trim your posts - don t send the entirety of the post you re responding to attached to
messages.messageBody:
I'd like to issue a personal plea to all posters - please please please
trim your posts - don't send the entirety of the post you're responding to
attached to your response. Please. :) Many of us read on digest, and it's a
real chore sometimes trying to figure out where new posts start and end, or
worse trying to find the new content written in short little bits in the midst
of a previous long post.

The *very* long post that started this conversation was very interesting to
read once, but it didn't need to be reposted another 20 or so times since
then. :)

Thanks bunches!
Deborah in IL - possesor of old slow eyes
